sentences.en: ...spending her few waking hours in front of the TV.
sentences.cn: …把她清醒的个把钟头花在电视机前。

sentences.en: A few days after his collapse he was sitting up in bed.
sentences.cn: 他病倒后没过几天就又能在床上坐起来了。

sentences.en: Few jockeys continue race-riding beyond the age of 40.
sentences.cn: 很少有职业赛马骑师超过40岁仍继续参加赛马的。

sentences.en: Few would argue that this team has experience and proven ability.
sentences.cn: 这个队伍的丰富经验和表现出来的实力是众所公认的。

sentences.en: He sweeps up and does a few odds and ends.
sentences.cn: 他扫完地，又干了几样杂活儿。

sentences.en: He'd only gone a few paces before he stopped again.
sentences.cn: 他只走了几步远就又停了下来。

sentences.en: He's a man of few words, very polite and unassuming.
sentences.cn: 他话不多，很有礼貌，为人谦和。

sentences.en: Her old man left her a few million when he died.
sentences.cn: 她老爸去世时留给了她好几百万。

sentences.en: his fiction has caused not a few readers to see red.
sentences.cn: 他的小说犯了众怒。

sentences.en: I can lose a few pounds without resorting to daft diets.
sentences.cn: 我不用疯狂地节食也能减轻几磅。

sentences.en: I have tried to pack a good deal into a few words.
sentences.cn: 我尽量言简意赅。

sentences.en: I've got to rush. Got a meeting in a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 我得赶紧走了。几分钟后要开个会。

sentences.en: In a few words she had put him in his place.
sentences.cn: 她简单几句话就杀了他的威风。

sentences.en: it had been around for a good few years.
sentences.cn: 多年来它一直挥之不去。

sentences.en: my inspired moments are few and far between.
sentences.cn: 我难得有灵感。

sentences.en: Precious few homebuyers will notice any reduction in their monthly repayments.
sentences.cn: 极少数购房者会注意到他们月还款额的减少。

sentences.en: quite a few people can do it.
sentences.cn: 这事许多人都干得了。

sentences.en: She must have cooked a good few dinners over the years.
sentences.cn: 这些年她一定做过不少次晚餐。

sentences.en: she visits every few weeks.
sentences.cn: 她每隔几周探望一次。

sentences.en: The London Evening Standard moved offices a few years ago.
sentences.cn: 《伦敦标准晚报》报址几年前迁走了。

sentences.en: The next few weeks will be a period of readjustment.
sentences.cn: 接下来的几周将是适应阶段。

sentences.en: there are no fewer than seventy different brand names.
sentences.cn: 不同的品牌名称多达70种。

sentences.en: There were few dry eyes in the house when I finished.
sentences.cn: 我说完后房间里没几个人不掉泪的。

sentences.en: This should not be an experience for the few.
sentences.cn: 这应该不只是少数人的经历。

phrases.tran_cn: 沉默寡言的人，少言寡语的
［强调数字大得惊人］ 不少于，多达
很少；只有几个；几乎没有

trans.tran_en: not many or hardly any people or things
a fairly large number of things or people
The few means a small set of people considered as separate from the majority, especially because they share a particular opportunity or quality that the others do not have
